Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Devil Gigatron twitches as Azureblade speaks to him, and questions him at the 
same time. Quickly his head snaps towards the bot.

Devil Gigatron: "Did the great one ask for your opinion jabroni? Because 
Devil Gigatron does not remembering asking for it, in fact Devil Gigatron 
does not believe he even told you to speak. If Devil Gigatron wanted to hear 
your whiny, scratchy, sceechy voice, Devil Gigatron would have asked for it! 
The next time you question the great one, Devil Gigatron is going to lay the 
Giga-slap down on your skidplate!"

--part1_87.e8ac275.28a88fee_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
